name: Margoyle
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons not made of adamantine

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a weathered, inanimate statue that is covered in fungus, lichen, and moss.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The margoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws; it can gore once with its horns instead of using its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft.; one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
